translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今まで命がけの冒険をしてきた会話とは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The conversation so far, despite having risked their lives on adventures,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思えぬほどに呑気なものだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was surprisingly carefree and carefree.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく、参るね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Honestly, it's baffling..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なにがですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What is?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今回、あの子達に行かせたのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This time, the places we sent those kids to,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とても無理と思われる場所ばかりだったのだが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were all places that seemed utterly impossible to conquer...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それをああ、ピクニック気分でクリアされてはね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But for them to clear them as if it were a picnic...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ……そうですね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes... that's right..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この子達は本当に強くなりました……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "These children have truly become strong..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「能力だけでなく、心も」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not just in ability, but in spirit as well."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それはおそらく、誰かを守る為だから……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's probably because they want to protect someone..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう、私達が止めても無駄でしょうね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's probably useless for us to try to stop them now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ねえ、リア女王、パステル女王？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, Queen Ria, Queen Pastel?"
"Hmph...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう認めてるわよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I've already accepted it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぷんぷん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pouting."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、本当に皆さん……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But truly, everyone has...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とってもとっても強くなりましたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: become so very, very strong."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい……私達が思っていたよりも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes... even more than we had imagined..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えへ、えへへ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, heheh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだか照れちゃうね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow, I feel shy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、子供の成長は早いって、本当ね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, it's true that children grow up so fast..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こないだまでおねしょしてたのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They were wetting the bed just the other day..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わあああ！？　なんてこと言うの！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Waaah!? What are you saying!?"
"Hehe..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王のところに行くには、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To go to the Demon Lord, you need,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 五つのオーブが必要なんて嘘話も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the story that five orbs are necessary is just a lie,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わざわざ作った甲斐がありましたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and it was worth making up that story."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあああああああああ！？！？！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whaaaaaat!?!?!?!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょちょちょ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wait, wait, wait!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、法王様がめっちゃ聞き逃せないこと言った！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Pope just said something we absolutely cannot overlook!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、五つのオーブと翔竜山にある巨大な扉、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, the five orbs and the giant door in Mount Shoryu,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれはAL教が作ったものですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that was created by the AL Church."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「＜エール＞が近づくと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When <Eru> approaches,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの扉がズゴーンと現れます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that door suddenly appears with a booming sound."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええええ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehhh!?!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、道理で……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, no wonder...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんなもの＜エール＞達と行くまでは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've never seen something like that until going with <Eru> and the others,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見たことがないと思っていたんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought I had never seen it before."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「メンバーが集合したからと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even if the members gathered,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それで翔竜山に行かれては、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if they then went to Mount Shoryu,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みすみす見殺しにしてしまうだけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they would just be left to die needlessly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「皆さんには成長をして頂く必要があったのです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It was necessary for everyone to grow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その為の五つのオーブです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The five orbs were for that purpose."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみにこれは各国の指導者、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By the way, this was something all the leaders of each country

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全員が知っていたことでもあります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: knew as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裏でこそこそと相談して決めたので」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They decided it after secretly discussing it behind the scenes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あはは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ahaha...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなところじゃないかなーって思ってた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought it might be something like that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どの指導者の方も、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Every one of the leaders,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらが捜索を依頼した翌日には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the day after we requested the search,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オーブを見つけだして下さっていたからね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: had found the orbs already..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最初からどこにあるのか知っていたわけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They knew from the start where they were."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケッ、結局＜エール＞の母ちゃんの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, in the end, it was all in <Eru>'s mother's hands."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手の平の上だったってことかよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meaning they've been controlled all along."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「手の平の上とは人聞きが悪いですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Saying 'in the palm of the hand' sounds harsh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 成長を促す為であることも事実ですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's true that it was also to encourage growth, however...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それ以上に私は、＜エール＞達に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "More than that, I wanted <Eru> and the others to..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思えぬほどに呑気なものだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was surprisingly carefree and carefree.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Honestly, it's baffling..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なにがですか？」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とても無理と思われる場所ばかりだったのだが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were all places that seemed utterly impossible to conquer...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それをああ、ピクニック気分でクリアされてはね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But for them to clear them as if it were a picnic...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ……そうですね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes... that's right..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この子達は本当に強くなりました……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "These children have truly become strong..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「能力だけでなく、心も」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not just in ability, but in spirit as well."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それはおそらく、誰かを守る為だから……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's probably because they want to protect someone..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう、私達が止めても無駄でしょうね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's probably useless for us to try to stop them now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ねえ、リア女王、パステル女王？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, Queen Ria, Queen Pastel?"
"Hmph...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう認めてるわよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I've already accepted it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぷんぷん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pouting."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、本当に皆さん……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But truly, everyone has...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とってもとっても強くなりましたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: become so very, very strong."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい……私達が思っていたよりも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes... even more than we had imagined..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えへ、えへへ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, heheh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだか照れちゃうね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow, I feel shy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、子供の成長は早いって、本当ね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, it's true that children grow up so fast..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こないだまでおねしょしてたのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They were wetting the bed just the other day..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わあああ！？　なんてこと言うの！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Waaah!? What are you saying!?"
"Hehe..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王のところに行くには、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To go to the Demon Lord, you need,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 五つのオーブが必要なんて嘘話も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the story that five orbs are necessary is just a lie,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わざわざ作った甲斐がありましたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and it was worth making up that story."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあああああああああ！？！？！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whaaaaaat!?!?!?!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょちょちょ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wait, wait, wait!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、法王様がめっちゃ聞き逃せないこと言った！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Pope just said something we absolutely cannot overlook!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、五つのオーブと翔竜山にある巨大な扉、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, the five orbs and the giant door in Mount Shoryu,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれはAL教が作ったものですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that was created by the AL Church."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「＜エール＞が近づくと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When <Eru> approaches,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの扉がズゴーンと現れます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that door suddenly appears with a booming sound."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええええ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehhh!?!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、道理で……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, no wonder...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんなもの＜エール＞達と行くまでは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've never seen something like that until going with <Eru> and the others,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見たことがないと思っていたんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought I had never seen it before."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「メンバーが集合したからと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even if the members gathered,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それで翔竜山に行かれては、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if they then went to Mount Shoryu,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みすみす見殺しにしてしまうだけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they would just be left to die needlessly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「皆さんには成長をして頂く必要があったのです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It was necessary for everyone to grow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その為の五つのオーブです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The five orbs were for that purpose."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみにこれは各国の指導者、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By the way, this was something all the leaders of each country

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全員が知っていたことでもあります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: knew as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裏でこそこそと相談して決めたので」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They decided it after secretly discussing it behind the scenes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あはは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ahaha...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなところじゃないかなーって思ってた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought it might be something like that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どの指導者の方も、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Every one of the leaders,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらが捜索を依頼した翌日には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the day after we requested the search,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オーブを見つけだして下さっていたからね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: had found the orbs already..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最初からどこにあるのか知っていたわけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They knew from the start where they were."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケッ、結局＜エール＞の母ちゃんの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, in the end, it was all in <Eru>'s mother's hands."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手の平の上だったってことかよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meaning they've been controlled all along."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「手の平の上とは人聞きが悪いですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Saying 'in the palm of the hand' sounds harsh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 成長を促す為であることも事実ですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's true that it was also to encourage growth, however...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それ以上に私は、＜エール＞達に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "More than that, I wanted <Eru> and the others to..."
